arts.ttl: Former Brighton winger set to swap Anderlecht for MLS side San Diego
arts.sum: Het Nieuwsblad are reporting that Anderlecht winger Anders Dreyer is set for a move to the MLS. According to the paper, the Danish winger will join San Diego for a…

arts.ttl: Official | Marseille prospect Enzo Sternal joins Anderlecht
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille prospect Enzo Sternal (17) has permanently left his formative club to sign for Jupiler Pro League side RSC Anderlecht, both clubs have announced. Sternal was previously convinced…

arts.ttl: Alderweireld furious with Anderlecht pitch in Croky Cup defeat: “And we keep wondering why no one watches the Belgian competition”
arts.sum: Toby Alderweireld was disgusted with the state of the Anderlecht's pitch as the purple and whites beat Royal Antwerp 1-0 in the Croky Cup.
